name: Records of suspensions and revocations of operating privileges to be maintained
text: §291E-63  Records of suspensions and revocations of operating privileges to be maintained.  The court shall notify the department of land and natural resources of any sanctions imposed for offenses or violations under this part and the period of suspension or revocation of operator privileges ordered by the court under this part. [L 2000, c 189, pt of §23; am L 2001, c 157, §27]
